Topic.Title: Can't get status attributes numbers to appear.

Posts.EditableText: In my game I'm adding an O2, but I can't show the player their current O2, does anyone know how to fix this?
Posts.HTML: In my game I'm adding an O2, but I can't show the player their current O2, does anyone know how to fix this?

Posts.EditableText:
Can you show us what you've got (the code that sets the attribute, and the statusattributes or povstatusattributes dictionary.

Does it just not appear, or does it show the wrong value? Is this your only status attribute? Do others appear fine?
